history.proof: qauto depth: 4 l: on use: Ropp_0, Rmult_le_compat_l, Rmult_le_reg_l, Rmult_comm, Rmult_0_r, sqrt_0, Rmult_0_l unfold: Rmin, Rle.

exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

original: intros a b c H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. rewrite Rmult_min_distr_l. rewrite Rmin_glb. rewrite Rmult_assoc. rewrite (Rmult_comm a b). rewrite Rmult_min_distr_l. rewrite Rmult_min_distr_r. rewrite Rmult_min_distr_r. reflexivity.
